title: If there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message
OB: When creating a chart and setting the data definition, if a column without any data is selected for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series, the system should display a friendly error message to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce: 
 1. Create a chart and set the data definition. 
 2. Select a column without data. 
 3. Observe that no error message is displayed.
